WEST PALM BEACH, Fla. Publix said it booked more than 41,000 appointments Wednesday morning for people to receive the COVID-19 vaccine.

articles.author: Jeremy Harris, KUTV
articles.title: Businesses that got PPP loans may be in for an unexpected tax bill - KUTV 2News
articles.description: As business owners prepare to file taxes this year, they may not be aware that they could have to pay taxes on federal relief loans they received in 2020. Caption: KUTV: Jeremy Harris reports The federal government waived taxes on Paycheck Protection Program …
